author: newsr.in
title: Shia LaBeouf Arrested in Austin for Public Intoxication, Acting “Bizarrely” - Photo
text: Actor Shia LaBeouf got himself in trouble with the law again, during a bizarre night out in Austin, Texas. He was there for the Austin City Limits music festival, but he ended up spending the night in jail after he got arrested for public intoxication. As of now, his publicist has not released any kind of statement on his latest “adventure,” but reports online say that he must be in a really bad shape, as he was acting “bizarrely” and was either incredibly drunk or incredi... »
